snippet.title: The Dream Observatory - Alfa Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Become the dream weaver in The Dream Observatory. Craft the perfect oniric journey for each dreamer by using and combining dream portal cards, tailoring each experience to their needs and emotions in this immersive cozy single-player cards management game.

STEAM DEMO
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3068640/The_Dream_Observatory/
